newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE sugar tightly mixed, August dominates.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE sugar tightly mixed, August dominates.

text.p: LIFFE sugar was tightly mixed, with volume dominated by August.
Of a total 2,681 lots by 1520 GMT, 2,131 were on soon to expire front month August, which was unchanged at $319.10
Traders described it as a pre-expiry market. There was a high proportion of AA trades in the volume, they said. And trades rolling positions from August into October also played a big role.
New York had failed to provide a lead, one said. "New York isn't really doing anything," he said.
Another trader, commenting on the longer term view for the market reckoned that sugar was building support before moving higher.
